red-hat-enterprise-linux-7-security-tech.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG)

v-204392.name: v-204392 - The Red Hat Enterprise Linux operating system must be configured so that the file permissions, ownership, and group membership of system files and commands match the vendor values.
v-204392.description: Discretionary access control is weakened if a user or group has access permissions to system files and directories greater than the default. Satisfies: SRG-OS-000257-GPOS-00098, SRG-OS-000278-GPOS-00108.

rules.attribute: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 STIG V1 findings
